alert.note: Alert for Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:46PM CST until January 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...McPherson and Logan Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
